        <u_project_name display_value="Equinix Legal Service Delivery Project">ac3b3b52c308221052237405e40131f8</u_project_name>
        <u_project_work>STORY NO:-  LGL 126 : GLOSS pop-up language for Transfer request
- Added a component for showing alert.
- Created a system property in sys_properties table to store the sys_id of GLOSS request .
- Created data resource for calling the system property.
- Created an data resource ACL with the fulfiller role.
- Created client state parameter for the alert , setting the field as Boolean and initial value as true.
- Updated the "Filter SubCategories" for showing the alert.
- Story completed and moved to SIT.


OTHER WORK :- 
Venka :
- Make  the type field read-only on the Create Cloud Database Catalog.
- Hide the "Request Governance Review" button .

ITC Edward ITSM Project:
- INC1009535 , reviewed Flow designers and updated the "run as" property to System user.</u_project_work>
        <u_remarks/>
        <u_resourse display_value="Treesa Thomas">2ea750a98381e650a946f896feaad3e1</u_resourse>
        <u_start_time>2025-03-18 05:30:00</u_start_time>

        <u_work_notes/>
    </u_project_effort>
</record_update>
